name: sentieon-haplotyper-gvcf
title: Sentieon Haplotyper in GVCF generation mode

inputSpec.label: Sorted Mappings
inputSpec.help: A coordinate-sorted BAM file with the mappings to call variants on.
inputSpec.name: sorted_bam

inputSpec.label: Reference genome fasta file
inputSpec.help: A gzipped file containing the reference genome that the reads were mapped against.
inputSpec.name: genome_fasta

inputSpec.label: Reference genome fasta index
inputSpec.help: The fai index file for the reference genome that the reads were mapped against.
inputSpec.name: genome_fastaindex

inputSpec.help: A BED file with target coordinates. If given, processing will be restricted to only inside those coordinates.
inputSpec.label: Target coordinates
inputSpec.name: targets

inputSpec.label: Location of the license server and Authorization token
inputSpec.help: A file containing the location of the license server as well as an authorization token for the account. It should contain two lines with the following format: license_server_location=<FQDN>:<PORT> and auth_token=<AUTH_KEY>
inputSpec.name: license_server_file

inputSpec.help: A prefix to use for the output files.
inputSpec.label: Output prefix
inputSpec.name: output_prefix

inputSpec.help: Extra command line options that will be supplied directly to the Sentieon execution.
inputSpec.label: Extra command line options (for driver)
inputSpec.name: extra_driver_options

inputSpec.help: Extra algo command line options that will be supplied directly to the Sentieon execution.
inputSpec.label: Extra command line options (for algo Haplotyper)
inputSpec.name: extra_algo_options

outputSpec.label: Variants
outputSpec.help: The called variants in block-gzipped GVCF format.
outputSpec.name: gvcfgz
